description: This file implements a React component for a chat page in a Next.js application. It manages chat messages, handles user input, displays message bubbles, and communicates with an API endpoint for responses.

methods.name: ChatPage
methods.description: React component that renders the chat interface, manages message state, and handles user interactions.

methods.name: handleSend
methods.description: Handles sending a message: sanitizes input, updates message list, calls API for response, and updates chat.

methods.name: onAttach
methods.description: Handles file attachment events, updating the message list to reflect attached files.
